content:
Early draft of a screenshot for the front page. Thoughts?
pasted image

Known bugs:

  • The "Topic 1" etc boxes with the arrows don't look good
  • Need avatars for the characters
  • Needs emoji reactions
  • Needs a pass at the text
  • Ideally would show off embedding an image
  • Ideally would explain what the interleaved view is, e.g. "Read recent messages first --->".
  • Needs to be taken on a higher resolution screen.
  • I should use fewer characters, and put them in alphabetical order.

At a more basic level, I'm worried that looking at this without any explanation is pretty overwhelming and not that helpful. Any ideas how to make the concept easier to digest?
A mitigating option is to have 1-2 sentences of accompanying text.
I feel like we should show a topic narrow, so you get the topic bolded in the sidebar and the message pane looks less busy. We probably want the compose box open.
Yeah, what I'd do is have a screenshot that just is in a topic narrow.
And have higher unread count numbers.
And then what I think we should is have a second panel in a carousel sort of thing where you can get a multi-topic screenshot.

second draft. Thoughts?
pasted image
Looks really good! One thing, I don't know what's irking me about the colored and circled numbers.
@Rishi Gupta Was wondering if this is related to the thread that was discussing the animated GIF for the front page? Is this going to be on the zulip home page?
Yes, this is that thread.

@Rishi Gupta I feel like it would be a lot more impactful to have animated GIFs inside of a carousel on the zulip homepage. Perhaps one for each of the points you listed in that image. So the first one would be perhaps narrowing into a topic from the all messages view, I'm not sure I really understand the second point in the image. I feel like reply when you get it could also much better be described via animated GIF. Each of the GIFS could be titled with the feature name -- like "Threaded Topics", "Group private chats", "Emoji Reactions" etc...

yeah, a few things I was thinking:

  • A static screenshot at the top of the page, which tries to make the main argument, and then has a "See Tour" button.
  • The tour is 4-5 screenshots that continue the main argument, that in a V2 turn into short screencasts. Could be in a carousel, or could be accessed via a list of links.
  • We add more screenshots to the /features page, which is where things like "Group private chats" will go
The thing I posted is the first thing. Possibly not making the argument particularly well, but that's the goal.
Attaching an example of what I mean. Currently its a video but could be encoded into gifs/web video zulip-gif-1.mp4 within the laptop.
Chrome doesn't preview .mp4 correctly. Follow the vimeo link if needed
https://vimeo.com/267266492
@Rishi Gupta I agree I think cluttering the home page isn't necessarily the best option. Excited to see what replaces the current image :smiley:

@Armaan Ahluwalia we're hoping to scope this project to not doing video/animated gifs, which are more work to polish to an acceptable level to put up. I imagine over time we will replace/expand these with animated GIFs or videos.
Makes sense. Let me know if I can help
